mapper.select: SELECT zsd.id, zsd.create_by, zsd.create_time, zsd.update_by, zsd.update_time, zsd.del_flag, zsd.sort_num, zsd.name, zsd.code, zsd.description FROM z_sys_dic zsd LEFT JOIN z_sys_dic_item zsdi ON zsd.id = zsdi.dic_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT zsd.id, zsd.create_by, zsd.create_time, zsd.update_by, zsd.update_time, zsd.del_flag, zsd.sort_num, zsd.name, zsd.code, zsd.description FROM z_sys_dic zsd LEFT JOIN z_sys_dic_item zsdi ON zsd.id = zsdi.dic_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT zsdi.id, zsdi.create_by, zsdi.create_time, zsdi.update_by, zsdi.update_time, zsdi.del_flag, zsdi.sort_num, zsdi.dic_id, zsdi.name, zsdi.code, zsdi.value, zsdi.show_flag, zsdi.disabled FROM z_sys_dic_item zsdi INNER JOIN z_sys_dic zsd ON zsd.id = zsdi.dic_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT zsdi.id, zsdi.create_by, zsdi.create_time, zsdi.update_by, zsdi.update_time, zsdi.del_flag, zsdi.sort_num, zsdi.dic_id, zsdi.name, zsdi.code, zsdi.value, zsdi.show_flag, zsdi.disabled FROM z_sys_dic_item zsdi INNER JOIN z_sys_dic zsd ON zsd.id = zsdi.dic_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
